question.text: Sodium benzoate <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mover><munder><mo>→</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi></munder><mrow><mtext>NaOH</mtext><mo>+</mo><mtext>CaO</mtext></mrow></mover><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi><mover><munder><mo>→</mo><mrow><mn>310</mn><mo>-</mo><mn>320</mn><mtext>K</mtext></mrow></munder><mrow><msub><mtext>Cl</mtext><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>,</mo><msub><mtext>FeCl</mtext><mn>3</mn></msub></mrow></mover><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi><mover><munder><mo>→</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi></munder><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>.</mo><mtext> </mtext><msub><mtext>H</mtext><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mtext>SO</mtext><mn>4</mn></msub></mrow></mover><mtable><mtr><mtd><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mo>)</mo></mtd></mtr></mtable></math>. Gram molecular weight of the major product(in grams) is
